items.sentence: You should suggest something like these to Tom.
Tom, as your friend, I suggest you go home now.
It was Tom who suggested this course of action.
Tom looked at the price tag and shook his head.
It was nice of you to buy Tom such a nice gift.
We should give Tom some time to think about it.
Do you remember how amazing Tom was at dancing?
Tom keeps a rabbit's foot as a good-luck charm.
Why isn't Tom ever interested in anything I do?
Why are you so interested in who Tom went with?
Tom was Mary's boyfriend in junior high school.
Tom probably knows what Mary is planning to do.
Tom kind of looks like somebody I used to know.
The city of Boston thanks you for your service.
Something has obviously caught Tom's attention.
Tom said I shouldn't do that until he got back.
Tom said that he didn't really like doing that.
Tom should've told Mary why she had to do that.
Who did Tom think was going to do that for him?
Why would Tom insist that Mary do that for him?
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was rich.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was satisfied.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was impressed.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was nice.
Both Tom and I were at John and Mary's wedding.
I thought I'd drop by and see how you're doing.
With a student ID card, you can get a discount.
Is there anyone here who doesn't like the plan?
It may take us up to thirty minutes to do that.
Do you know anybody who works in that building?
Tom is in almost every picture in Mary's album.
Tom doesn't yet know whether he'll come or not.
Tom wasn't able to translate everything for me.
Do you think the weather will be fine tomorrow?
How did you manage to get that done in one day?
Tom was standing in the front of the classroom.
There's no way that Tom speaks three languages.
I believe the actions that Tom took were right.
I think they should put a heavy tax on imports.
I found the problem easier than I had expected.
The question is whether Tom will agree with us.
Listen carefully to what I'm going to tell you.
Come what may, I'm determined to accomplish it.
Tom's book isn't selling as well as it used to.
We decided to stay inside since it was raining.
The three boys sat close together on the floor.
I don't know how long it'll take me to do that.
Are all four of your grandparents still living?
I know lots of people who can't cook very well.
I don't want my neighbors to feel sorry for me.
